Rename PDH to PYRUVDEH-RXN, add genes
E1 component: SPO2241 [pdhB], SPO2240 [pdhA], E2 component: SPO2242 [pdhC], E3 component: SPO0340 [lpdA] (+ SPO2222? from DB2)

name: Pyruvate dehydrogenase
metabolites: CO-A[c] + NAD[c] + PYRUVATE[c] --> ACETYL-COA[c] + CARBON-DIOXIDE[c] + NADH[c]
gene_reaction_rule: (SPO2241 and SPO2240 and SPO2242 and (SPO0340 or SPO2222))
